name: Rise of the Mushrooms
description:
Submission for the GMTK Game Jam - 2020.

Theme: Out of Control

NOTE: Some browsers seem to have difficulty playing this game, I have provided a Win32 standalone version for those who encounter this issue.

You are a powerful mushroom, well versed in the art of spore magic. The others of your kind have befallen a terrible fate, a curse that causes them to repopulate at an alarmingly fast rate, oh and they're cannibals now trying to eat you. You try to quell the spread, but it's too late, they don't stop coming, and the more you defeat, the more will come, until it gets completely out of control.

It tends to feel more out of control around the 5+ minute mark if you can last that long.

Controls:

WASD (or Up,Down,Left,Right arrows)to move
Space to jump
Q and E to rotate the camera (or Right Alt and Right Control)
Mouse to aim, Left click to attack highlighted area.
Escape to open menu

Didn't have time to implement a leaderboard, but feel free to post screenshots of your times!

The Team:

Programming/Design - DreadKyller
Art/Design - ClawtheWolf
Music/Sounds - Pavel
